message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price of $12000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'd like to get closer to the value I perceive the product to be worth.
I understand you're looking to get closer to the value you perceive the product to be worth, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'd like to try to get even closer. How about $10500?
I'm getting closer to your target price, but I'm still not willing to go below $11500. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so I'm offering you the product for $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to try to get even closer to my target price. How about $10000?
